videos.description: Jalen Brunson drains the 3-pointer to take the lead and complete the Mavericks' rally.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Mavs take the lead on Brunson's 3 after erasing 20-point deficit) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Mavs take the lead on Brunson's 3 after erasing 20-point deficit

videos.description: Keldon Johnson's layup attempt gets denied by Maxi Kleber.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Maxi Kleber meets Keldon Johnson at the rim with a big block) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Maxi Kleber meets Keldon Johnson at the rim with a big block

videos.description: Luka Doncic confidently nails a heavily guarded 3-pointer with ease.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka doesn't hesitate to hit long 3-pointer) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka doesn't hesitate to hit long 3-pointer

videos.description: Bryn Forbes drains a 3-pointer to beat the halftime buzzer and give the Spurs the lead.
videos.headline: Bryn Forbes daggers buzzer-beating 3

videos.description: Luka Doncic backs down Lonnie Walker IV and cashes in the fadeaway.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka hits smooth fadeaway over Walker) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka hits smooth fadeaway over Walker

videos.description: Luka Doncic powers through contact for the and-1 bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka gets tough and-1 to fall) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka gets tough and-1 to fall

videos.description: American Airlines Arena gets loud as Luka Doncic drains a big 3-pointer for the Mavericks.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Mavs arena goes wild after Luka splashes in step-back 3) 2021/10/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Mavs arena goes wild after Luka splashes in step-back 3

videos.description: Luka Doncic heats up in the second half with 19 points to lift the Mavericks to a win vs. the Spurs.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Luka overcomes slow start to rally Mavs to win) 2021/10/29 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: Luka overcomes slow start to rally Mavs to win
